document_data.name: ''Nightmare''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Nightmare''''' was an enchanted [[dagger]] that was the favored [[weapon]] of [[Baravar Cloakshadow]], the [[gnome]] [[deity]] of deception and [[illusion]]s.<ref name=frcs-3e-p240">
document_data.Powers: This ''+4 dagger'' was wielded by the [[avatar]] of the Sly One. Targets hit with this dagger would be coated in a deadly [[venom]] that caused [[hold monster|paralysis]]. The immobilized creature would be subjected to the ''[[nightmare]]'' [[spell]], and lose the effects of their last night's rest. As such, their previous wounds that had healed overnight would re-emerge, and the target would feel absolutely exhausted.
